3D Vision Reading Group


YouTube Channel / Email / Slack

Welcome to the 3D Vision Reading Group website! We're thrilled to have you here. Join us every week at the University of Toronto as we dive into the exciting world of 3D Vision. From cutting-edge topics like NeRFs, 3D Gaussian Splats, to the latest in Diffusion Models for 3D, and who knows what else might come up - we're passionately interested in it all! Let's explore, learn, and have fun together!

Presenters can select their preferred date for sign-up here, while the paper to be presented each week is usually chosen from recently released papers, typically from the past week or two leading up to the presentation date. Sessions will be recorded and saved to our YouTube Channel.
